Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Nice (L'Arenas), ibis Styles Nice Aéroport Arenas is minutes from Asian Art Museum and Phoenix Park. This hotel is within close proximity of Charles Ehrmann Stadium and Palais Nikaia.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 91 air-conditioned rooms featuring plasma televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Irons/ironing boards and cribs/infant beds are available on request.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as a seasonal outdoor pool or take in the view from a rooftop terrace.

Dining
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a computer station, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. A roundtrip airport shuttle is complimentary at scheduled times.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is noon
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Located in Nice (L'Arenas), ibis Styles Nice Aéroport Arenas is minutes from Asian Art Museum and Phoenix Park. This hotel is within close proximity of Charles Ehrmann Stadium and Palais Nikaia.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Asian Art Museum - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Phoenix Park - 0.2 km / 0.2 mi
Charles Ehrmann Stadium - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Palais Nikaia - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Base Nautique Beach - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
CAP 3000 Shopping Center - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
L'Esplanade-des-Goelands Beach - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Foundation Lenval Children's Hospital - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Archet Hospital - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Saint Laurent Port - 3.2 km / 2 mi
L'Entree du Port Beach - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Nice Museum of Fine Arts - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
Saint-Antoine de Ginestiere Church - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Allianz Riviera - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Renoir Museum - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi

The nearest airports are:
Nice (NCE-Cote d'Azur) - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Monte Carlo (MCM-Monaco Heliport) - 17.4 km / 10.8 mi

The preferred airport for ibis Styles Nice Aéroport Arenas is Nice (NCE-Cote d'Azur).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
